name: D-Switch
description:
D-SWITCH is a multi-dimensional brain teaser.

Switch between 3D and 2D to move the ball towards pinpoint!

Apart from multi-dimensional paths few more mechanics make you think harder.

This is a game entry for BYOG 2021.

Themes used:

Two Views : 3D and 2D view

Reset : You need to think clever to reset back to 3D view. Pin point appears only in 3D view

Minimal Interactions : Only Arrow key controls. 

Design, Art, Programming by Kishor Berde

This build has 5 levels!
